text: Bigɨna bakɨme khaŋ muuŋgi. Nden ruru tɨvi gu bigi nzerara kɨv, nde Kraisan buna vhuueŋ zɨn ŋgɨri. Maaŋ muuŋgip, gu zɨv, nde ganɨnga o, gu khar kɨv, nden kameŋra mbarararga, gu kaŋgi, nde thɨga havhargiap, nde ndava bavira kav, ndɨkndɨk bavira kav, nde wari tɨgap ŋgarav, Zisas buna vhuueŋ khothivɨr zav gumgi gu mbigi ndɨkndɨgi khavi.
